mdRecord.dcterms:title: Desert Landscape and Village Scene, Location Unknown, ca. 1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph shows a desert landscape scene in the American Southwest. Though the location is unknown, it is believed to be Arizona ca 1893. In center of photo is a desert scrub ladscape with several adobe and wooden buildings. In background is a mountain range. In foreground is what appears to be a tent anchor and rope. Overall image heavily faded to yellowish tan with a mark in bottom left center of the photo. A darker brown portion is at left
